definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Fish of larger rivers of China similar to the Mississippi paddlefish.
sentences.chinese: 產於中國大河的匙吻鱘與密西西比河流域中的相似。

sentences.english: This land drains into the Mississippi.
sentences.chinese: 該地區向密西西比河排水。

sentences.english: The Mississippi is the biggest river in the United States, stretching 2,320 miles.
sentences.chinese: 密西西比河是美國最大的河流，全長2320英里。

sentences.english: Waves on the mississippi swamped boats and washed others upon the shore .
sentences.chinese: 密西西比河的浪濤將船隻擊沉並將其它東西衝至岸上。

sentences.english: The houseboat on the banks of the Mississippi in which my great-grandmother lived.
sentences.chinese: 我曾祖母住在密西西比河附近，在河堤旁有一艘遊艇。

sentences.english: Vicksburg lies where the Mississippi and Yazoo Rivers meet.
sentences.chinese: 維克斯堡位於那裏的河流密西西比河和亞祖見面。

sentences.english: They escaped into the Mississippi River and have migrated northward ever since.
sentences.chinese: 它們逃到了密西西比河，並從那時起一直向北遷移。

sentences.english: For the next four years he steamed up and down the Mississippi.
sentences.chinese: 此後四年中，他往返航行於密西西比河上。

sentences.english: The Mississippi River may be mightier than anyone ever imagined.
sentences.chinese: 密西西比河可能比任何人想象的還要強大。

sentences.english: Several years ago, flooding along the Missouri and Mississippi rivers destroyed thousands of acres of wheat.
sentences.chinese: 幾年前，密蘇里河密西西比河氾濫摧毀很多小麥田。

sentences.english: Ore and coal had been barged down the Ohio to the Mississippi.
sentences.chinese: 礦砂和煤已被用駁船沿俄亥俄河運載到密西西比河。

sentences.english: The Mississippi Valley-type (MVT) lead -zinc deposits are the classic epigenetic hydrothermal ores.
sentences.chinese: 密西西比河谷型礦牀爲後生熱液礦牀。

sentences.english: They saw the junction of the mississippi and the minnesota .
sentences.chinese: 他們看到了密西西比河和明尼蘇達河的匯合處。

sentences.english: Like the Mississippi, it just keeps rolling along.
sentences.chinese: 就像密西西比河河水一樣，它不斷地滾滾向前。

sentences.english: African American's tenant's home beside the Mississippi River levee.
sentences.chinese: 非洲裔美國人的租客家旁邊的密西西比河大堤。

sentences.english: Almost all its native-born Americans came from east of the Mississippi.
sentences.chinese: 而幾乎所有生於本土的美國人都來自密西西比河以東。

definition: Great Lakes/the five north American Great Lakes
Lake Michigan, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]
Lake Erie, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]
Lake Ontario, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]
Lake Victoria or Victoria Nyanza, Kenya, on the White Nile
Delaware River, between Pennsylvania and Delaware state, USA
Lake Huron, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]
